column4: qzair: there wasnt a service called service but there was a service called server which had to do with network sharing that was running and whn i tried to mpa the drive wiht \\gj\Test it coudlnt find the path
are you logged in as administrator on xp box?
click connect with different username, and type: \\gj\ubuntu_user_name
hmm, you put in the appropriate username and password for the linux box right?
what i put in for username : \\gj\swedekid\
are you able to create a file?
after the name worked, did you press okay to create the networked drive?
did you go ahead and click okay?
would it just be possible for you to help me get the correct resolution for virtual box and use that for file sharing?
sorry man i can't seem to figure it out. i'll forward you some links to some good samba tutorials. unforutnately i don't know anything about VB
